mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSttOrdModLdadng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , UDT_DT FROM STT_ORD_MOD_LDADNG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.updateSttOrdModLdadng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ STT_ORD_MOD_LDADNG SET UDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSttOrdModLdadng Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM STT_ORD_MOD_LDADNG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
